Articles.Content:
I always wondered who at Squad devised the signature Kerbal X and the rest of the stock crafts.

Was it you Harv?
I made the "flying bedstead" VTOL tester originally, and I think the Z-map satellite. I can't remember beyond that.
Yay, a dev answered! I thought it might have been just Harv too.

The VTOL is a lot of fun to mess around with, Nova. 

HarvesteR made the Learstar, new in v1.0. (For the story, link in my sig.)
Harv made the Ravenspear (dont remember the name. the one with 4 jet basic engines) IIRC.
